sentences.english: People who are travelling will always try to make it  to San Francisco because of that diversity.
sentences.chinese: 因爲舊金山的多元化，人們會喜歡到這裏來旅行。

sentences.english: I wanted to complain about them to the city of San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我決定向舊金山市政府提意見。

sentences.english: Jinshan conscious weakness found old adversary, joy in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 金山自覺發現了老對頭的軟肋，心中欣喜。

sentences.english: Picture the Bay Bridge in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下舊金山的海灣大橋。

sentences.english: I am writing on behalf of our a non-profit organization in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我寫在我們在舊金山的非營利組織的名義。

sentences.english: There's an observatory on Mt. Zijin.
sentences.chinese: 這南京紫金山上就有一座天文臺。

sentences.english: What do you want to see in SFO ?
sentences.chinese: 你們在舊金山想看一看什麼？

sentences.english: Can you recommend some good places to take pictures in San Francisco?
sentences.chinese: 你能推薦幾個舊金山適合拍照的地方嗎？

sentences.english: What do you think about the shopping district  in San Francisco?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得，舊金山的購物區怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Transit workers in the San Francisco Bay Area are on strike.
sentences.chinese: 舊金山海灣地區的運輸工人舉行罷工。

sentences.english: Do you think San Francisco is a good place to start your own business?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得舊金山適合你創業嗎？

sentences.english: I have been using Kingsoft Antivirus since I bought my computer.
sentences.chinese: 例句自從我買了電腦，我就開始使用金山毒霸。

sentences.english: And it was my first time to see the Aquarium of the Bay in San Francisco with my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 這是我來舊金山，第一次跟表妹去當地的海洋館。

sentences.english: San Francisco is so diverse. There's so many different neighborhoods and
sentences.chinese: 舊金山非常多元化。有很多不同風格的社區，

sentences.english: The mountain you see to the right is the Purple Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 山上看到你的權利是紫金山。

sentences.english: What are the departure times of flights on Saturdays from Beijing to San Francisc?
sentences.chinese: 週六北京飛往舊金山的班機幾點起飛？

Jinsha county in Bijie prefecture 畢節地區|毕节地区[Bi4 jie2 di4 qu1], Guizhou/Chinsha town in Kinmen County 金門縣|金门县[Jin1 men2 xian4] (Kinmen or Quemoy islands), Taiwan

Zhenhai district of Ningbo city 寧波市|宁波市[Ning2 bo1 shi4], Zhejiang

Dashan, stage name of Canadian Mark Henry Rowswell (1965-), actor and well-known TV personality in PRC
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
mountain range/mountain ridge

large river (esp the Yellow River)
northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
Fangshan county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西
